fr.n7.saceca.u3du.model.ai.statement
Class StatementFactory

java.lang.Object
  fr.n7.saceca.u3du.model.ai.statement.StatementFactory

public class StatementFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory for creating Statement objects. The implementation is chosen after the contained expression for maximum performance.
